One person hosts and controls the game. This is the host. Come up with a unique code for your dance party, press apply, and then share this code with others who join as follower. Leave the server field empty to use the default server. Use the Just Dance Now app instead of the browser to start a dance for better synchronization between users. Choosing an already chosen code will result in infinite loading, so come up with something unique!

Please report any issues on the issue tracker.
